prefix: PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX : <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX dbpedia2: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
base_request: SELECT ?label (COALESCE(?optionalTitle, "Saint") as ?titre) WHERE { ?lien a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Saint>; a dbo:Person;rdfs:label ?label. OPTIONAL {?lien dbo:title ?optionalTitle.} FILTER regex(str(?lien ), "$$$BASE_VAL$$$") . FILTER (lang(?label) = 'en'). } LIMIT 4
desc_request: SELECT ?lien ?label ?desc ?pic WHERE { ?lien a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Saint>; a dbo:Person; rdfs:label ?label;rdfs:comment ?desc.OPTIONAL { ?lien dbo:thumbnail ?pic. } FILTER regex(str(?label ), "$$$BASE_VAL$$$") . FILTER (lang(?label) = 'en'). FILTER (lang(?desc) = 'en'). }
